name: Neko:Insufficient FIREPOWER
description:
Neko Insufficient Firepower is a meat pigeon 2D tablet shooting game, a cat-themed game made in a hand-drawn comic style.
There are three kinds of weapons in the game that can be freely matched, and combined with weapon upgrades/random upgrade effects/talent effects/character skills/companion skills/bond skills/weapon dark matter (endless mode) to form a Build, which can realize various gameplays.
The game is currently divided into classic mode and endless mode.
·Classic mode: There are 5 levels in total, each level carries a Boss, and it is divided into 4 levels of difficulty to challenge.
·Endless Mode: It needs to be unlocked after clearing the classic mode with difficulty level 3 or above. There is no BOSS but there are new dark matter monsters, and dark matter modules can be dropped to customize and strengthen weapons. Dark matter monsters can randomly acquire a variety of skills.

At the same time, there are also cat fashions to dress up your cute cats and companions~

Discord:https://discord.gg/ZWwUe3a6
Welcome to join my discord and give me the advices!!
